## RumInitConfiguration.sessionReplaySampleRate property

The percentage of tracked sessions with \[Browser RUM &amp; Session Replay pricing\](https://www.datadoghq.com/pricing/?product=real-user-monitoring--session-replay\#real-user-monitoring--session-replay) features: 100 for all, 0 for none. See \[Configure Your Setup For Browser RUM and Browser RUM &amp; Session Replay Sampling\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real\_user\_monitoring/guide/sampling-browser-plans) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sessionReplaySampleRate?: number | undefined;
```
